verses.roman:
āra dina sārvabhauma-ādi bhakta-saṅge
vasiyā āchena mahāprabhu kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; sārvabhauma-ādi—headed by Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; bhakta-saṅge—with the devotees; vasiyā āchena—was sitting; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge—engaged in discussions of topics concerning Kṛṣṇa.
translation: The next day Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu sat with all the devotees, headed by Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya, and they discussed the pastimes of Kṛṣṇa.
